name: Temporal AI - Low Success Rate Alert
description: Alert when pattern success rate drops below 50% with significant usage
query: SELECT pattern_id, ROUND(success_rate * 100, 1) as success_pct, ROUND(error_rate * 100, 1) as error_pct, recommendation_count FROM temporal_ai_recommendations WHERE success_rate < 0.5 AND recommendation_count > 10
